gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB,
with
ADJUNCT

sense.def:
To haul something somewhere
pomeni nekaj s težavo nekam vleči, ker je težko.

seg.quote: They hauled the pilot clear of the wreckage.
Ralph hauled himself onto the platform.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
a long haul
, zahteva veliko časa in truda.

seg.quote: We began the long haul up the cobbled street.
...as women begin the long haul to equality.
He got hauled up in court for assaulting a student.
